GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.16.10
GSD.description:
net: dsa: bcm_sf2: don't use devres for mdiobus

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.10 by commit 08e1a3554e99a1a5bd2835907381e2383ee85cae, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit ac3a68d56651c3dad2c12c7afce065fe15267f44. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: dsa: bcm_sf2: don't use devres for mdiobus
